title: Barnes & Noble Is Having a Mother's Day Sale on Books and Gifts
author: Jacob Kienlen
text: There's some interesting gift ideas in here.Barnes & Noble is one of the best places to buy books in stores or online in 2025, but they have also expanded their inventory well beyond just books in recent years. The online storefront has started selling LEGO sets, Blu-rays, and even home decor. With the current Mother's Day sales going on right now, Barnes & Noble is a surprisingly good place to find a worthwhile gift at a decent price.The two Mother's Day specific promotions Barnes & Noble has running currently are buy one, get one 50% off sale on coloring books and craft kits. But outside of that the coupons and deals page includes up to 25% off best-selling novels like Fourth Wing and other Romantasy series. There are some overall great deals in here on some classics, though. A ton of Doctor Who DVDs are included in the sale, including the David Tenant years, plus discounts on popular series like Downton Abby, Poldark, and Sherlock.This specific promotion only lasts through May 11 or for as long as stock remains.Does Barnes & Noble Have Free Shipping?Barnes & Noble does have free shipping, but according to the help page, it is only for orders of $40 or more as long as the item isn't "unusually sized or overweight." html:
There's some interesting gift ideas in here.

Barnes & Noble is one of the best places to buy books in stores or online in 2025, but they have also expanded their inventory well beyond just books in recent years. The online storefront has started selling LEGO sets, Blu-rays, and even home decor. With the current Mother's Day sales going on right now, Barnes & Noble is a surprisingly good place to find a worthwhile gift at a decent price.

The two Mother's Day specific promotions Barnes & Noble has running currently are buy one, get one 50% off sale on coloring books and craft kits. But outside of that the coupons and deals page includes up to 25% off best-selling novels like Fourth Wing and other Romantasy series. You can browse our top picks of the sale below or check out all of the deals yourself.

Buy One, Get One 50% Off Adult Coloring Books

Adult coloring books have been on the rise in popularity as folks look for more stress-free activities to take up their time with. They've become so popular, in fact, that some of Amazon's best-selling books of 2025 are adult coloring books. Barnes & Noble has quite a few options in this sale ranging from $8 to $12. With the current promotion going on, you can pick up two of these coloring books for as little as $12 total. Though you'll need to purchase coloring utensils separately.

This sale is currently set to end on Monday, May 12. So you have an extra day to shop these discounts if you're planning on buying these as a late Mother's Day gift.

Up to 25% Off Popular Paperbacks

It wouldn't be a Barnes & Noble sale without some good discounts on some of the best-selling novels of the past decade. The company is dropping prices on some of the best-selling fiction series like Fourth Wing, A Court of Thorns and Roses, Harry Potter books, and even the Hunger Games novels.

These discounts are only valid on the paperback versions of these books, so if you're looking for hardcover options you'll still need to pay full price.

Buy One, Get One 50% Off Craft Kits

See All Crafting Kits

If you, or a mom you know, is really into crafting then these little kits make for an excellent gift. There is a mix of easy crochet kits, pottery kits, and even a candle making kit as part of this sale. Each of these is only $10, so you can pick up two for the price of only $15 during this promotion.

Similar to the other Mother's Day promotion on this list, this deal will end on May 12.

50% Off British TV Blu-rays and DVDs

50% Off British TV Blu-rays and DVDs

Barnes & Noble is having a very specific sale on releases of British TV shows. There are some overall great deals in here on some classics, though. A ton of Doctor Who DVDs are included in the sale, including the David Tenant years, plus discounts on popular series like Downton Abby, Poldark, and Sherlock.

This specific promotion only lasts through May 11 or for as long as stock remains.

Does Barnes & Noble Have Free Shipping?

Barnes & Noble does have free shipping, but according to the help page, it is only for orders of $40 or more as long as the item isn't "unusually sized or overweight." You also have to make sure you choose "standard shipping" as the option when checking out. Alternatively, you can choose to order online and pick up in-store if you have a location near you. You can take advantage of the online Barnes & Noble store finder to see your closest option.

Originally posted: May 6, 2025 11:30 pm
